title: Las Vidas de Fèlix
overview: Filmmaker Fèlix Colomer Vallès has dabbled in many different worlds – as a champion chess player, soccer referee, porn film director, trap artist, and vegetarian activist – all before his 30th birthday. When he becomes a father, Fèlix begins to wonder if he wants his child to repeat any of his eccentric life experiences and decides to embark on a journey seeking lessons for his son. A cathartic and deeply personal docuseries, The Lives of Fèlix (Las Vidas de Fèlix) offers an in-depth look at the twists and turns of Felix's extraordinary life as he reconnects with the unique and influential characters who've helped him make crucial decisions along the way.
